articles.author: Elizabeth MerrillESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: Texas A&M Aggies cruise, 'use that energy from the crowd' to eliminate rival Texas Longhorns at Men's College World Series
articles.description: Texas and Texas A&M have been playing baseball against each other since 1904, but the stakes had never been higher than Sunday, when the Aggies won, 10-2, in the Men's College World Series, eliminating the rival Longhorns.
articles.content: OMAHA, Neb. -- In the maddening wait before Micah Dallas took the mound in Sunday's rivalry showdown against Texas, the Texas A&M right-hander deeply contemplated one piece of advice: It's just a… [+4438 chars]

articles.author: Paolo Uggetti
articles.title: Will Zalatoris after third second-place finish at major: 'This one hurts'
articles.description: Will Zalatoris missed a 14-foot birdie putt on the 18th hole that would have put him in a playoff with eventual winner Matt Fitzpatrick.
articles.content:
BROOKLINE, Mass. -- Will Zalatoris came up short again and this time, he thought he had it.
After missing a 14-foot birdie putt on the 18th hole that would have put him in a playoff with winner Matt… [+3457 chars]

articles.title: England's Matt Fitzpatrick wins 2022 U.S. Open by 1 stroke for first major title
articles.description: Englishman Matt Fitzpatrick won the U.S. Open on Sunday, winning his first major on the same course where he took the U.S. Amateur title nine years earlier.
articles.content:
BROOKLINE, Mass. -- Matt Fitzpatrick of England is a champion again at The Country Club, this time with the grandest of trophies.
A U.S. Amateur champion in 2013. The U.S. Open champion Sunday.
In … [+2385 chars]

articles.title: Pittsburgh Pirates' Jack Suwinski becomes 1st rookie in MLB history with 3-homer game that includes walk-off blast
articles.description: The Pirates' Jack Suwinski on Sunday became the first rookie in major league history to have a three-homer game that included a walk-off home run, according to the Elias Sports Bureau.
articles.content: PITTSBURGH -- Jack Suwinski hit his third homer of the game in the ninth inning, giving the Pittsburgh Pirates a 4-3, walk-off victory over the San Francisco Giants on Sunday to avoid a three-game sw… [+3801 chars]

articles.title: San Diego Padres third baseman Manny Machado leaves game after injuring his left leg in first inning
articles.description: San Diego third baseman Manny Machado left the Padres' game against the Rockies in Colorado on Sunday afternoon after his left ankle appeared to turn awkwardly while he was running to first base in the top of the first inning.
articles.content: DENVER -- San Diego Padres star third baseman Manny Machado has left Sunday's game against the Colorado Rockies after injuring his left leg while taking a tumble at first base trying to beat out an i… [+1393 chars]

articles.title: Colorado Avalanche travel without injured Andre Burakovsky ahead of Game 3 of Stanley Cup Final
articles.description: Avalanche forward Andre Burakovsky is staying back in Denver for at least one more day to be evaluated for an injury. Burakovsky has not been ruled out for Monday's Game 3.

articles.title: FINA votes to restrict transgender women from elite swimming competition
articles.description: Swimming's world governing body FINA has voted to restrict the participation of transgender athletes in elite women's competitions and create a working group to establish an "open" category for them in some events.

articles.title: Where Stephen Curry ranks among the NBA's all-time great guards after securing his fourth title
articles.description: Four rings, two MVPs and a career of changing the sport. The list of NBA players at Stephen Curry's level just got a lot shorter.
articles.content: Now that Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry has won his fourth championship and earned the Bill Russell NBA Finals MVP Trophy for the first time, how high has he climbed in the all-time ranking… [+7094 chars]
